achievements.name: Toe in the Water
achievements.description: Play for 10 turns, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Cruise Control
achievements.description: Win a game in Newbie or higher difficulty against AI.

achievements.name: Asleep at the Wheel
achievements.description: Win a game in Easy or higher difficulty against AI.

achievements.name: Just Warming Up
achievements.description: Win a game in Normal or higher difficulty against AI.

achievements.name: Strove, Sought, Found, Did Not Yield
achievements.description: Win a game in Hard or higher difficulty against AI.

achievements.name: Barely Broke a Sweat
achievements.description: Win a game in Serious or higher difficulty against AI.

achievements.name: Piece of (True) Cake
achievements.description: Win a game in Impossible or higher difficulty against AI.

achievements.name: The Learner Is Now the Master
achievements.description: Win a game in "Endless" difficulty against AI.

achievements.name: Press the Flesh
achievements.description: Play a game in multiplayer with at least one another human.

achievements.name: Cage Match
achievements.description: Win a game in multiplayer with at least one another human.

achievements.name: Bigger Is Better
achievements.description: Win an Expansion Victory.

achievements.name: Maybe It Does Buy Happiness
achievements.description: Win an Economic Victory.

achievements.name: Diplomanic
achievements.description: Win a Diplomatic Victory.

achievements.name: Dice with the Universe
achievements.description: Win a Science Victory.

achievements.name: Numbers. They Don't Lie.
achievements.description: Win a Score Victory.

achievements.name: Mwa ha ha ha haaa!
achievements.description: Win a Supremacy Victory.

achievements.name: I Am the Eternal End
achievements.description: Win an Elimination Victory.

achievements.name: Gaze Upon It and Tremble!
achievements.description: Win a Wonder Victory.

achievements.name: Boot Camp
achievements.description: Finish the basics of tutorial.

achievements.name: Un-Broken
achievements.description: Win with the Broken Lords.

achievements.name: No Pain, no Gain
achievements.description: Win with the Ardent Mages.

achievements.name: Share This!
achievements.description: Win with the Wild Walkers.

achievements.name: (Belch!)
achievements.description: Win with the Necrophages.

achievements.name: Ka-ching!
achievements.description: Win with the Roving Clans.

achievements.name: So Outta Here
achievements.description: Win with the Vaulters.

achievements.name: Diplomeisters
achievements.description: Win with the Drakken.

achievements.name: The End is Nigh
achievements.description: Win with the Cultists of the Eternal End.

achievements.name: I Did It My Way
achievements.description: Win with a Custom Faction.

achievements.name: Maxed Out
achievements.description: Activate all the 4th levels in the Empire Plan.

achievements.name: Cash Cow
achievements.description: Have one city which produces more than 1 000 Dust.

achievements.name: Harvester
achievements.description: Have one city which produces more than 1 000 Food.

achievements.name: Labs and Fabs
achievements.description: Have one city which produces more than 1 000 Science.

achievements.name: Massively Mass Production
achievements.description: Have one city which produces more than 1 000 Industry.

achievements.name: Corridors of Power
achievements.description: Have one city which produces more than 500 Influence.

achievements.name: Making Friends
achievements.description: Assimilate 3 minor factions.

achievements.name: Epilogue
achievements.description: Finish the last chapter of a faction quest.

achievements.name: What's Mined is Mine
achievements.description: Exploit each kind of strategic resource in one game.

achievements.name: Just in Case
achievements.description: Have 100 of each strategic resource.

achievements.name: Guinea Pig
achievements.description: Use a booster of each luxury resource, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Stimulated
achievements.description: Have 5 active luxury boosters at the same time.

achievements.name: Squirreling Away
achievements.description: Use a Food, a Science, and an Industry stockpile in one game.

achievements.name: Cities Builder
achievements.description: Have two cities in less than 15 turns.

achievements.name: Urban Sprawl
achievements.description: Have 3 city tiles at level 2 in one of your cities.

achievements.name: Real Estate Mogul
achievements.description: Build 100 improvements in your entire Empire in one game.

achievements.name: Fast Start
achievements.description: Be the faction with the highest score at turn 25 playing on hard or higher difficulty.

achievements.name: Quick Out of the Blocks
achievements.description: Be the faction with the highest score at turn 25 playing on Endless difficulty.

achievements.name: Pheidippides
achievements.description: Explore 1 000 tiles before the 50th turn.

achievements.name: Resistance Is Useless
achievements.description: Pacify 500 villages, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Me and Croesus
achievements.description: Gain 1 000 000 of Dust, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: All Roads Lead to Me
achievements.description: Get 20 trade routes or more starting from, crossing or reaching your empire.

achievements.name: A Byte of Barons
achievements.description: Have 8 heroes in one game.

achievements.name: Endless Leveling
achievements.description: Level up a hero to level 15.

achievements.name: Scourge of Auriga
achievements.description: Kill 1 000 units, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Madder than Max
achievements.description: Kill a roving city.

achievements.name: Who, Me?
achievements.description: Attack a friendly army with privateers.

achievements.name: Landscaping
achievements.description: With the Ardent Mages, have 5 pillars at the same time.

achievements.name: The Not So Broken Lords
achievements.description: With the Broken Lords, have a district producing more than 10 Dust.

achievements.name: I <3 Minions
achievements.description: With the Cultists, have 20 converted villages at the same time.

achievements.name: Fighting for Peace
achievements.description: With the Drakken, win a game without having been in war.

achievements.name: Battlefield Buffet
achievements.description: With the Necrophages, use 10 recycled stockpiles in one game.

achievements.name: Internal (and External) Revenue Service
achievements.description: With the Roving Clans, get more than 1 000 Dust from the Market Place taxes.

achievements.name: Here Comes the Cavalry
achievements.description: With the Vaulters, teleport 10 units in a besieged city in one turn.

achievements.name: Float Like a Butterfly
achievements.description: With the Wild Walkers, win a battle against at least 4 enemies without taking any damage.

achievements.name: Endless Day
achievements.description: ...in the ruins all across Auriga, and even throughout...

achievements.name: Way Better Than Napoleon
achievements.description: Conquer 5 cities during a single winter.

achievements.name: BFFs
achievements.description: Finish a game while never breaking an alliance you made at least 100 turns ago.

achievements.name: Dungeons & Drakken
achievements.description: As the Drakken, exploit at least 5 ruins at the same time.

achievements.name: Loremeister
achievements.description: Win a Quest Victory.

achievements.name: I Built it my Way
achievements.description: Win a game with generation presets other than default.

achievements.name: Collect'em All
achievements.description: Have the 5 different Guardians at the same time.

achievements.name: Marvelous
achievements.description: Have the 5 Legendary Buildings at the same time.

achievements.name: Heedful, Deedful
achievements.description: Complete all the Legendary Deeds, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: What's Yours is Mine
achievements.description: Capture a city containing a Legendary Building.

achievements.name: The Bigger They are...
achievements.description: Kill a Guardian.

achievements.name: Teamworker
achievements.description: Contribute to a completed Co-operative Quest.

achievements.name: Homeland Serenity
achievements.description: Capture 10 spies, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Deep Mole
achievements.description: Perform 5 infiltration actions without leaving the infiltrated city.

achievements.name: I Came I Slew I Scampered
achievements.description: With a spy, return a governor to his owner's academy without being detected.

achievements.name: Plunderiffic
achievements.description: Pillage 30 buildings, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Sticky Fingers
achievements.description: Get 500 Dust by pillage.

achievements.name: Unforgettable
achievements.description: Win a game with the Forgotten.

achievements.name: Cheaters Come Out Ahead
achievements.description: With the Forgotten, be the first to reach the 2nd Era.

achievements.name: IP Piracy
achievements.description: With the Forgotten, steal 10 researches.

achievements.name: String of Pearls
achievements.description: Collect 1 000 Pearls in one game.

achievements.name: Pearl Addiction
achievements.description: Collect 10 000 Pearls, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Cultured Pearl
achievements.description: Collect 1 Pearl Cluster with a value of at least 20.

achievements.name: Like Peipus
achievements.description: Start and win a battle on frozen waters.

achievements.name: Berezina
achievements.description: Lose one army due to the thaw.

achievements.name: Devotion
achievements.description: Spend 1 000 prayers on Winter votes, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Jeweller's Shop
achievements.description: Unlock all Blessings of the Altar of Auriga in one game.

achievements.name: Aurified
achievements.description: Win with the Allayi.

achievements.name: Shapeshifter
achievements.description: Have 100 force-shifted units, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Celebrate Diversity
achievements.description: Fight with an army, reinforcements included, having both Light and Dark forms of each of the Allayi units (Seeker, Skyfin and Monk).

achievements.name: Acquisitive Traveler
achievements.description: Extract 100 strategic or luxury resources in another empire, across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Maritime Monopoly
achievements.description: Control every Fortress in the world.

achievements.name: Facility Completionist
achievements.description: Control each of the unique facilities across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: By Any Means
achievements.description: Complete your control of an ocean by trading for a Fortress.

achievements.name: Surprise!
achievements.description: Ambush an enemy army from a fog-bank.

achievements.name: It Came from the Depths
achievements.description: Attack an army containing only land units with an army containing only submersible units.

achievements.name: Maritime Myths
achievements.description: Complete 5 quests for the Fomorians in a single game.

achievements.name: Fomorian-bane
achievements.description: Capture 50 Fomorian-controlled Fortresses across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Full Deck
achievements.description: Win a battle using an army containing each type of Fomorian warship.

achievements.name: Xerophobic
achievements.description: As Morgawr, win the game without ever building or purchasing land units (except for Settler units).

achievements.name: Mare Nostrum
achievements.description: As Morgawr, control an ocean which borders 4 or more land regions you control.

achievements.name: The Sun Never Sets
achievements.description: As Morgawr, control one region on at least 4 different continents.

achievements.name: Black Spot, Clean Hands
achievements.description: As Morgawr, use a Black Spot to prompt the elimination of an empire by a third party.

achievements.name: The Grim Wave
achievements.description: Win a game with the Morgawr.

achievements.name: United Empires
achievements.description: Win a Shared Victory.

achievements.name: Golems Rule!
achievements.description: Achieve victory with the Kapaku.

achievements.name: A World Of Fire And Ash
achievements.description: Volcanoform 400 tiles over any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Geomancer's Delight
achievements.description: Possess a unit with all Geomancy buffs active simultaneously.

achievements.name: Scorched Earth Policy
achievements.description: Volcanoform an enemy city's entire exploited tiles.

achievements.name: Dustjacker
achievements.description: Ambush an enemy army from a Dust Blizzard.

achievements.name: A Total Eclipse Of The Art
achievements.description: Possess an army with all Dust Eclipse map-based buffs active simultaneously.

achievements.name: Night Rider
achievements.description: Search 12 Temples in a single Dust Eclipse.

achievements.name: Speed Walker
achievements.description: Move an army 20 tiles in a single turn with the Wild Walkers.

achievements.name: Pyromaniac
achievements.description: Sacrifice 8000 total HP using Soul Burn over any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Finest Vault Reserves
achievements.description: Teleport 5 or more units to a sieging Vaulter hero.

achievements.name: Cold Cuts
achievements.description: Spawn 30 Battle Born using Cadaver stockpiles in a single game.

achievements.name: Share The Pain
achievements.description: Inflict 800 damage with a single unit in a single attack as the Ardent Mages.

achievements.name: Beetlejuiced
achievements.description: Kill an enemy hero with a Setseke.

achievements.name: Peace Talker
achievements.description: Restore the peace with a least 3 empires within a single turn.

achievements.name: Machiavellian
achievements.description: Win 8 battles with armies exclusively composed of minor faction units within a single turn.

achievements.name: Mildew'd
achievements.description: Win with the Mykara.

achievements.name: Sporetastic
achievements.description: Create 1000 Fungal Blooms across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Blooming Marvelous
achievements.description: Create 50 Fungal Blooms in a single game.

achievements.name: Resistance is Futile
achievements.description: Integrate 7 factions in a single game.

achievements.name: Welcome to the Fold
achievements.description: Control 20 Overgrown Cities at the same time.

achievements.name: Monster Wrangler
achievements.description: Control all 3 Urkans at the same time.

achievements.name: Shadow of the Colossi
achievements.description: Have all 3 Urkans affect a single one of your cities at the same time.

achievements.name: The Exterminator
achievements.description: Kill 1000 Lice units across any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Shake your Foundations
achievements.description: Deal 1 000 000 damage with Tremors over any number of playthroughs.

achievements.name: Catch and Release
achievements.description: Take control of an Urkan owned by another faction and set it free (in the same turn).
